lenders.name: LutherKiva
lenders.loan_because: we are called to serve those in need.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to loan $25, and when it joins with other contributions, it becomes a valuable contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a computer, organizing information for my company and our customers.

lenders.name: Eiji
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe that helping others will make me happy. Yes, I want to become even happier :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I produce media to spread the messages of love, compassion, and altruism.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. I loan because I have a few dollars that could change someone elses life. I loan because it makes sense. I loan to empower others.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to George Mason University full time as a student to earn a degree in Systems Engineering.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have had so many amazing blessings in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small church camp, where children and youth come in the summer to spend time in nature, develop their spirituality, and deepen their relationships with each other.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I believe its the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's easy

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: it makes more sense to give a step up than a hand out
lenders.occupational_info: I wouk with computers

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach literature at a high school for young artists.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people achieve their dreams

lenders.name: Bill Moore
lenders.loan_because: You must give something to your fellow men - even if it's a little thing, do something for others something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it
lenders.occupational_info: President of Project New Hope Inc. We provide free weekend retreats to veterans and their families to include our Gold Star families.

lenders.name: Clay & Joyce
lenders.loan_because: There, but for the grace of God, go I.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: While growing up we never had much. So not that I am older It makes me happy to give to the people who need it more that I do.

lenders.name: Daniel & Tricia
lenders.loan_because: it can make a difference in someone's life!

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I feel I am very fortunate and want to share with others.  People have given me a hands up and I just want to keep it going.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired - garden, quilt, cook, travel, spend time with grandchildren and friends

lenders.name: Adaobi
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back. I grew up in Africa, and I am who I am today because of the community I grew up in. Helping out in the little way that I can serves not only the borrower, but also his/her community (and I am confident about that).
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the public Accounting system, and my job is analytical with great attention to detail. My clients range from private individuals to non profit organizations.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: To lend a hand
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan their financial future.

lenders.name: Darby
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, this is just such a great idea.  I really hope it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on internet websites for the company AT&T.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I wan't to promote sustainable development among women.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of higher-value currency can have a significant and positive impact on the lives of people in less fortunate economic circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer data usable.

lenders.name: Abraham
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies who are focused on healthy, active, and sustainable living to raise money for their businesses by helping them find the right business partner.

lenders.name: GiftCalledHope
lenders.loan_because: I love to help empower people and assist in making this world a better place to live!
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed as crisis intervention worker in a women's shelter assisting those fleeing from abusive relationships.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's refreshing and uplifting to help anyone hoping to make a better life for themselves and their families without asking for a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an ultrasonic inspector of specialized metals. A very interesting and enjoyable occupation. I love animals in general and share my home with five beautiful birds.

lenders.name: Trond&Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I love Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: Sales

lenders.name: Kostas
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I found myself wasting small portions of my income to completely useless staff (CDs, DVDs, mp3 players etc). All these things costs nothing to purchase for me. 
On the other hand, I can help someone on the other side of earth 5.000kms far away and that's make me... EXCITED !

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I should share a little of my luck in being born in an affluent society.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young men and women about working with wood and woodworking machinery.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It feels like a worthwhile, tangible investment.  There's plenty of money out there in the world, why not share it?
lenders.occupational_info: I do a number of different jobs, but my main one is helping people acquire English proficiency.

lenders.name: Elsa
lenders.loan_because: It is an effective way to help people to progress and help themselves as well as others around them.

lenders.name: ERIC
lenders.loan_because: Some $ are less useful for me than for new helpless entrepreneurs

lenders.name: Extreme Team
lenders.occupational_info: We are loaning prize money we won at the University of Maryland, College Park computer programming contest.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's such a small amount of money - I don't need to buy that grande latte! - and it makes such a large difference to the people who receive the loans. It's the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for designs soccer fields, baseball fields, and outdoor areas for people of all ages to enjoy sports. We build these fields and parks for schools, universities, and cities.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Globalization should happen through people, not just corporations.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help businesses be successful while improving the health of the natural environment.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I care about making a difference through helping people to develop successful businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform, review and manage financial statement engagements as well as income tax returns and other business consulting projects.

lenders.name: Change for Change
lenders.loan_because: We can!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a Senior High School in Alberta, Canada. As a class project we decided to help others who need it.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me throughout my life. This is one of the ways I try to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help find software solutions for business problems.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: it helps someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I take everything that exists, and everything that has existed or will exist, and I tie it up in little packages and redistribute it to the world.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to leave the world a little better each day.
lenders.occupational_info: P B Swammich greeting cards are designed with a combination of peaceful imagery and positive words.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.occupation: Director, INSPIRE Project at Loyola Univ Chicago

lenders.name: Zach King
lenders.loan_because: I am self employed and an entrepreneur myself and believe there are few things more rewarding than supporting your family by doing what you love and care about. And micro-lending is an amazing way to make a real difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I do graphic design, web design and programming, and other online and print projects. Basically I design websites for organizations that want to be found on the internet, and also design logos, business cards, flyers, etc. I also do volunteer work for non-profits and other organizations, and care deeply about the environment, community, and helping others.

lenders.name: trey
lenders.loan_because: i hope it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: computer stuff.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to read the profiles and I like the idea of helping people to make a better life for themselves and their families.  I love Kiva because it feels like a way to bring the world closer together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a database developer for a software company.  My partner, Matt, and I live in the San Francisco Bay area with our two dachshunds, Loki and Jules.

lenders.name: Bret
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate to have been raised in a middle-class family from the United States.  I am inspired to help out those less fortunate than me, both locally and around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school (secondary) Business Education teacher.  I engage, motivate, and inspire the future leaders of this world.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing I've helped someone... instead of blindly handing my money to an organization and it might help. I loan exclusively to women because I feel they probably have a harder time around the world in general. I hope they know that some little lady in Oklahoma is thinking about and is helping as much as she can.
lenders.occupational_info: I update system pricing for 74 vendors in my company's system. We have stores all over the US and a few other countries. I work on the 8th floor of a building downtown in a cubicle. It's just as boring as it sounds.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and I know how important it is to work hard and feel accomplished.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people exercise and be more healthy. I make sure they do not hurt themselves, or help them if they have already hurt themselves (back pain, knee pain).

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others succeed...
lenders.occupational_info: I will soon be graduating as a registered nurse :)

lenders.name: ecotox consult
lenders.occupational_info: self-employed ecotoxicologist (research on side effects of man-made chemicals on ecosystems)

lenders.name: Myles
lenders.loan_because: The world is a big scary place; can't we all just get along.
lenders.occupational_info: I design roads and oversee their construction.

lenders.name: John and Nancy Amonson
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: Harmonize life with money.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I am a teacher and I want to live out the lessons I teach my students.

lenders.name: Alina
lenders.loan_because:
“Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.” 
― Horace Mann

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: it is an investment in world peace and understanding.
lenders.occupational_info: When people come to my theatre, I sell them their tickets and help them find their seats.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Thais
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to move forward and upward, in helping people dedicate themselves to what they are good at, in making a difference by allowing others to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I design art, logos, collateral materials (corporate and performing arts), websites, and presentations. I am also an agent of change, I write a blog about food, cook, and connect people with different cultures and traditions through food. I have a dream of starting a community garden in my neighborhood; and traveling the world in service of others and the environment.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: It's important for me to show my children how lucky they are, and that they CAN make a difference.

lenders.name: Bretta
lenders.loan_because: Love God, Love your neighbor. KIVA has given my family MANY new neighbors!  Our tiny of bit doing justice in God's world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor who uses a microscope to diagnose disease.  I work with your doctor to help them treat you!

lenders.name: GlobalMom
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in many different countries and have an appreciation for the small businesses around the world.  I am glad to have the opportunity to help someone be successful.

lenders.name: Velten Family
lenders.loan_because: we are called to love our neighbor as ourselves

lenders.name: Matt & Katie
lenders.loan_because: We feel that God has a huge heart for the poor, and we want to be like God.
lenders.occupational_info: Matt is involved in designing online classes, Katie is involved in health research and education.

lenders.name: katrina louise
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to run their own business!
lenders.occupational_info: i photograph people: for weddings, parties, family portraits, engagements.

lenders.name: Steve & Family
lenders.loan_because: To teach our kids about the difference they can make in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies secure information on the web.

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: i want to help for a start
lenders.occupational_info: we design clothes and sell it

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I am provided for, and I am called to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage teenagers to have a relationship with Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: charity alone is not enough to end poverty.

lenders.name: Mark T
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses market their products and services and communicate their messages.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to help others! If I can help even one person to make things a little easier.....that is just fantastic :) Some of us have too much, and don't even know it.While there are too many who need our help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time in an office as an Accounting Assistant.I do a lot of filing and bookeeping. My husband and I have a 2yr old son, Jonah. I spend the rest of my time running after him! He sure keeps us busy,but we love him so much.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: Christ calls us to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach or instruct engineers and technicians how to fix and maintain aviation electronics, such as computers and radars in the aviation industry, FAA and around the world..

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer for an electronics manufacturer.  I work in the continuous improvement office, mentoring my fellow team members.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping each other to grow and build a better world.  Extending my hands to those in need, I have an opportunity to give them a chance for something better and new.  It could be an opportunity to have their own business.  It could be giving a child the chance of going to school.  It could be the simple fact of helping them fix something they need for their everyday life.  Any little help, it may seem little, but can make a huge difference in someone's life.  We can all make this world a little better for someone else. =)

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: If I were in that situation, I would want people to loan to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I dispatch Technicians all over the United States, and part of Canada, to work on computer problems with commercial businesses like Wal-Mart.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I've had help raising cash from friends, and I know how it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I run barbershops in the UK & the onlinebarbershop.co.uk It's hard work and cash flow is just as much a problem in my business as any other. Long hours worked and no time to rest!

lenders.name: Ebony
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone else live a better life.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the mission of microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business courses at a community college in beautiful Santa Monica, California. I have recently won a grant to study microlending, and the best way to study it is to provide loans to budding entrepreneurs!

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I like to change the world for the better, one person at a time, $25 at a time, because that is on my scale.

lenders.name: MJ DeMarco
lenders.loan_because: I understand that in some parts of the world, many people don't have the resources or opportunities available like my countrymen do here in the United States.  Hopefully, we can improve, if not create, those opportunities to those who have no choice but to be entrepreneurial due to impoverished circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired entrepreneur and author.

lenders.name: Molliver
lenders.loan_because: As an artist, I am especially inspired by how the arts can empower people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: By day, I work for a statewide arts agency.  I value being a public servant and ensuring that all people have access to the arts.  In my free time, I indulge in my own creative endeavors and projects.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I share the same world as you...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people see better...

lenders.name: Sam W-R
lenders.loan_because: I feel that all people wealthy enough to spend money on such non-necessities should give away the spare cash sitting on the couch to somebody that really needs it and change their life at the expense of a MacDonalds combo.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending school and i am 15 years of age

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I have what I need in life, and I want to help others achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Accounting and Finance full time. I work for a company that finances loans for businesses.

lenders.name: Matthew & Erin
lenders.occupational_info: Helping school districts, city and county governments finance infrastructure needs.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.loan_because: I've been to small towns in far away countries, so just a little lagniappe in exchange for the good times and smiles I have received in distant places.
lenders.occupational_info: I take visitors to New Orleans on bike rides down the back streets of our city so they can get a true taste of our local color and flavor.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I like the feeling that I can help someone out and make a difference somewhere in the world.

lenders.name: Teleia
lenders.loan_because: sometimes people need a little help getting started.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I care for people.

lenders.name: MED1A.nl
lenders.loan_because: it feels good..--.
lenders.occupational_info: movin' bits && bytes..--.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: We should all help each other achieve the change we want to see in this world.

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way for people to support others either in their own area or in a foreign country.  You don't have to be incredibly wealthy to help someone else avoid or escape poverty. Every little bit counts!

lenders.name: Zipei
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve an equal chance to raise a quality life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time high school student, working to impact the world; one step at a time.

lenders.name: Diane M.
lenders.loan_because: I think that this is a great program. If I can make someone's life just a little bit better, then that's what I want to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor in charge of an Episcopal Congregation in Wisconsin, USA.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help someone else reach their dream.  I like to assist others when they are putting forth an effort to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher/REI

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I look for farmers who are using mineral fertilizers and/or organic practices because I believe all farming needs to move in the that direction for sustainability and health.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow tumor cells in culture dishes to study their biochemistry.

lenders.name: antzara
lenders.loan_because: It's right
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and I teach people

lenders.name: Maradel
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to improve her or his life.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lenders.name: The Holubar Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.  We want our kids to know how good it feels to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Like the applicants on KIVA, I am an entrepreneur who chose to work for myself in order to raise my kids.  I call it making a living without a job.  It's hard, but when people talk about retiring, it's hard for me to relate.  My life and my work are the same.  I can't imagine retiring from my life.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I started out doing design work by myself so I know how hard it is to start a small business. Kiva is a great way to help out people around the world who are trying to build stronger communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites for a major labor union in the United States representing nurses, janitors, teachers, security officers, and more.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: If I were in their shoes, I would appreciate help in retaining a sustainable life.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is a path to world peace.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to enact positive change in this world.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: It's Fun

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I am like an architect, but for the outdoors. When a building is built, I design everything that goes around it, like walkways and benches and plants and fountains.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I'm inspired by the energy and creativity of Kiva's entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the State of California. My unit gives grants to local communities for environmental projects - like restoring a creek or building a trail. In the evening I teach history at community college.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a telecommunications engineer and businessman.

lenders.name: Carly
lenders.loan_because: even a nineteen year old can impact somone for the better.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: Selling Photographies worldwide

lenders.name: SF Opera
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of a dozen friends who love opera and we get together each year for a special dinner.  This year in 2008 in addition to gifts to each other, we are giving a KIVA loan.

lenders.name: John B
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher at a private university in the Netherlands which is specialized in Business Analyses.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves makes so much sense!
lenders.occupational_info: I used to teach computer applications - now I use the computer for fun and to donate! I also make homes pretty for sale - it's called staging - and I enjoy that very much!

lenders.name: Hind
lenders.loan_because: it helps make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky and can! Also because this is the best idea I've seen in years. KIVA rules!!!

lenders.name: Amanda, Wade & Boys
lenders.loan_because: a little help can mean the world of difference to someone's entire life, community & happiness.

lenders.name: Sarita
lenders.loan_because: I can. With the little I have, I consider myself very rich indeed, being able to keep a bit aside to lend to someone not as fortunate as I but who probably appreciates its value better than I. My goal is to be able to build up enough "loan credit" to make a loan each month of the year.

lenders.name: Parvin
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a hand up to get where you want to go.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a tech in a vet clinic taking care of animals, but I'm currently in school to be a vet.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this will work
lenders.occupational_info: Solution Architect - Online Video Services

lenders.name: Markus & Emily
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of creating opportunities for people and helping them to improve the local infrastructure.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: teach 15 & 16 year old students about the world around them

lenders.name: Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in global humanity, and that each small act can have an effect on individuals, communities and eventually the world at large.  Compassion and action are ideals we try to instill in our children.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.occupation: university office staff/ local elected offical

lenders.name: Lacy Selig
lenders.loan_because: "Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow." -- Thornton Wilder

lenders.name: Marsh
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I do good things for the world around me whenever I can.

lenders.name: Claire-Pascale
lenders.loan_because: I can...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance graphic designer

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.occupational_info: I create businesses and invest in other entrepreneur's futures.

lenders.name: Nogah
lenders.loan_because: building stronger communities is important.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the most innovative young people to support them in creating innovative, sustainable, and system changing enterprises

lenders.name: JirkaV
lenders.loan_because: because I can and I believe I should

lenders.name: Niall
lenders.loan_because:
"We are one, but we are many, and from all the lands on Earth we come, we share a dream and sing with one voice." -"I am Australian" by Bruce Woodley. 

We are all part of one big family.

lenders.name: Florian
lenders.occupation: Student at IE Business School, Madrid, Spain
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: A friend gave me a gift card several years ago. I've loved re-lending the same $25 over & over!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in local government.

lenders.name: Lucille
lenders.loan_because:
I found myself unemployed and my Mother lent me money to start my business.  I opened an embroidery shop and ran it for 15 years. I sold it a year ago and retired. I know how it feels to struggle and forge ahead.
I hope I can help someone who needs a little assistance too!  My heart goes out to you...good luck!
lenders.occupational_info: I embroidered logos on jackets and hats and shirts for companies. I also embroidered names on garments, towels, baby gifts and more. I never got rich but I supported myself and my children and paid all my bills.

lenders.name: kara
lenders.occupation: stay at home mom to two little boys

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I am a seamstress as well, and know what an impact you can make in this business. It is about the people and work together. Sew on!
lenders.occupational_info: I make, design and alter wedding gowns and bridal wear.

lenders.name: Lisa van Es
lenders.loan_because: I don't want to save the world- I want to empower people to save themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Co creating a world that works for all life.

lenders.name: Ulla
lenders.loan_because: I have a work and a relatively good economie.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to stop staring at my navel, and yeah... I'd like to help someone buy a goat.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I'm always looking for the next good investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Fitness and Outdoor GPS devices and sometimes wear a moustache.

lenders.name: PerformInsight LLC
lenders.loan_because: We want to support other entrepreneurs as a way to improve the lives of many.
lenders.occupational_info: PerformInsight provides software that helps other companies manage their workforces better and ensures that workerrs are more satisfied with their jobs.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I can and I feel the responsibility to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: marketing and sales for a publisher

lenders.name: Astrid
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jenilyn
lenders.loan_because: love

lenders.name: Sneha
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a sustainable way to help people out of poverty.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate from Kiva.  I am happy to help a deserving business person get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit professional organization.

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit can help, even if you are a student. :-)

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others around the world so that they can have the best live for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become an elementary school teacher. When I graduate, I will teach in a low-income school in the U.S.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: When people in a community rise above poverty, they have freedom and choices in their lives; they gain autonomy. These loans allow business owners to make this kind of improvement in their lives. It helps the individual, their family, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We raise pigs, organically and sustainably. I also help math students online.

lenders.name: Young family in Cowichan
lenders.loan_because:
We as a Family have so much, and want to share with others.  This started in December 2008 as the Christmas gift for my (then) 9 year old son, Nicholas.   My Daughter Maggie then got a gift certificate to Kiva from an Uncle. 
Christmas 2009 brought more certificates and a lot of repaid loans.  Bill is onboard too, we all believe in supporting others.
Maggie says, "by the way, you should say that your name is Teri."  So now I have.

lenders.name: Dax
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Svenne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with less opportunity than me.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer programs to help other people business.

lenders.name: Ron & Ginny
lenders.loan_because:
None of us lives in a vacuum,  People have helped us our whole lives; they have taught us and  formed us to be responsible , contributing citizens of our communities, our country and the world.
We are blessed to have what we do,
so helping another person with a hand up is a privilege for us.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired from retail sales, civil service ( firefighter) and  self employed small business owners.

lenders.name: Remi
lenders.loan_because: Christ's love compells me

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I believe you need money to make money. What better way to encourage people around the world to dream and grow their businesses so they can support their families. Making it count one dollar at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family farm to produce food for our community. We produce chickens and eggs for consumption.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower people by helping them to become prosperous and independent. I feel that people who have the financial means to do so are obligated to help those who don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a website for a college in New England, which is a region in the northeast United States.

lenders.name: Robina Warrys
Chanti
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is one of the most simple, effective, and meaningful ways to give people the tools to lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Unbiased Wealth Mgmt.
lenders.loan_because: we care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: Harmonizing life with money.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.occupational_info: I work for KickStart International, a social enterprise that develops and promotes technologies such as irrigation pumps that can be used by dynamic entrepreneurs to establish and run profitable small scale enterprises.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to make a difference in the world, by enabling people to establish or maintain a business for making a better living and supporting their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm managing the development of software applications for an international financial organisation.
